articles.author: Zinia Bandyopadhyay
articles.title: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui hits back at Priyanka Chopra for calling director Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy 'South Asian' - India Today
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra had shared an appreciation post for director Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy. However, Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui, who was a part of the film Mom, is not happy with Priyanka's post for this reason.
articles.content: By Zinia Bandyopadhyay: Priyanka Chopra Jonas has been creating a niche for herself in the West. The actress is all set for her next, The Russo Brothers’ Citadel. Recently, she took to her Instagram … [+2163 chars]

articles.title: Not Smart Enough! US Smart Bombs ‘Punctured’ By Russian EW Attacks; Intel Report Says JDAMs Fizzling Out - EurAsian Times
